values: Sorrow is a very sad feeling.
The girl felt sorrow after her best friend moved away.
n. 悲伤；懊悔；伤心事 vt. 为…悲痛 vi. 懊悔；遗憾；感到悲伤

- n. 悲痛，悲伤；遗憾，懊悔
- 不幸的事；忧患
